alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 22 at 1:40AM PST until December 22 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility of less than a quarter of a mile in dense fog. * WHERE...The Rogue River Valley in Jackson County. This includes the cities of Rogue River, Gold Hill, Jacksonville, White City, Central Point, and Medford. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A front is likely to mix the air mass and bring light rain to the area between 4 and 7 AM PST. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow for plenty of room between you and other vehicles. * Fog makes objects appear farther away than they are * Use low beams. High beams reflect back thick fog, making visibility worse for you and other drivers. * Be prepared. Keep your headlights clean. That way, you`re ready for low-visibility conditions * Don`t use cruise control. Most crashes occur because the driver is going too fast for weather conditions.
